scripts.full-build: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Path '../../Part2/Phonebook/dist' -Recurse -Force; cd ../../Part2/Phonebook; npm run build; Copy-Item -Path 'dist' -Destination '../../Part3/Phonebook' -Recurse -Force"
scripts.deploy: npm run full-build && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
